mapper.insert: INSERT INTO developers (github_id, github_username, country, talent_rank, created_at, updated_at, bio, following, followers) VALUES (#{githubId}, #{githubUsername}, #{country}, #{talentRank}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{bio}, #{following}, #{followers})
mapper.select: SELECT github_id,github_username, talent_rank, bio, country FROM developers ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10
SELECT github_id, language, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM projects WHERE github_id = #{githubId} GROUP BY github_id, language ORDER BY tag_count DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT language, COUNT(*) AS language_count FROM projects WHERE github_id = #{githubId} GROUP BY language ORDER BY language_count DESC LIMIT 3
